pr_title: Fix ACRA bug reports not containing stack trace

timeline.message:
Fix empty stacktrace in bug report

ACRA has to be initialized after MultiDex
https://github.com/ACRA/acra/issues/619
https://github.com/ACRA/acra/wiki/Troubleshooting-Guide#legacy-multidex

Do not init ACRA if inside its own process

https://github.com/ACRA/acra/wiki/Troubleshooting-Guide#applicationoncreate

timeline.bodyText: Could you move this up to the other com.google dependencies? And could you put the version in ext instead? That's what we do if we depend on multiple parts of the same library that thus needs the same version. And why depend on a RC?
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText:
Could you move this up to the other com.google dependencies?

I put them here since they are related to ACRA, but ok

And why depend on a RC?

Apparently ACRA's (probably a little bit outdated) documentation suggests 1.0-rc6, so I chose the latest RC, 1.0-rc7. The version suggested in e.g. google/auto#665 (again, outdated) is also an rc, and in the releases page there is no AutoService version which is not an RC (with rc1 dating back to 2014).
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
I put them here since they are related to ACRA, but ok

No, they're not related to ACRA, we just currently happen to only use it in that code.

Apparently ACRA's (probably a little bit outdated) documentation suggests 1.0-rc6, so I chose the latest RC, 1.0-rc7. The version suggested in e.g. google/auto#665 (again, outdated) is also an rc, and in the releases page there is no AutoService version which is not an RC (with rc1 dating back to 2014).

I found out about there not being a non-RC version just after I commented, so I think that's OK.
replies.author: wb9688

timeline.message:
Remove deprecated calls to set Sender class to ACRA

setReportSenderFactoryClasses() is deprecated, now extensions (ReportSenderFactory is an extension) should be registered using AutoService: https://github.com/ACRA/acra/wiki/Custom-Extensions#by-annotation

Remove deprecated calls to set Sender class to ACRA

setReportSenderFactoryClasses() is deprecated, now extensions (ReportSenderFactory is an extension) should be registered using AutoService: https://github.com/ACRA/acra/wiki/Custom-Extensions#by-annotation
